title.rendered: “Lot Of Fireworks Emotionally”: Novak Djokovic On Wimbledon Final vs Nick Kyrgios

content.rendered:
The whole world’s eyes on Wimbledon, There are “Lot of Fireworks Emotionally” on notable Tennis Grand Slam which will be played between Novac Djokovic vs Nick Kyrgios. Both champions will enter into court aiming to book record.

            Djokovic, The six times Wimbledon Grand Champion has a good chance to win seventh Wimbledon singles title on Sunday. He will face Australia’s top ranking tennis star Kyrgios for Trophy.

            Djokovic, WTA’s 3rd ranking player reached final after beating Cameron Norrie of Britain in four sets on Friday. The fight was very tight between two, one side Norrie were batteling for giving Grand Trophy to Great Britain at center court in his homeland, and the other side Djokovic, Serbian Star were focusing on a record 32nd Grand Slam Final in the men’s game. Finally Djockovic won the semi-final with 2-6, 6-3, 6-2, 6-4.

            On Thursday, Rafael Nadal a WTA’s 4th ranking star withdrew from the tournament because of his abdominal injury. He announced that he is unable to participate in semi-final against Kyrgios. Nadal’s decision not playing semi gave Kyrgios a free pass into his first Grand Slam Final. Earlier, Nadal had said, “I can not play semi-final against Kyrgios due to his pain.” After taking over T Fritz in quarter final on Wednesday. Djokovic fans Said,

            “It will very exciting match between Novak Djockovic vs Nick Kyrgios. There are a lot of chance to win Grand Slam Final for Djokovic according to his previous records.”

They told to reporter on a question that if Kyrgios success to take over Serbian champion in Final then it would his fate. “Kyrgios is to down in ranking list comparing to Djokovic.” They said.

All England Club(AEC) shared a post on Wimbledon’s official twitter handle regarding exciting Grand Slam Final. Wrote in post “The Stage awaits now for our final.”

Friday’s Semi Final(Men’s Single)Result

  1. N. Kyrgios        vs         R. Nadal               Walkover
  2. Kyrgios got free pass for Final
  3. N. Djokovic     vs         C Norrie 

2, 6, 6, 6                       6, 3, 2, 4

Grand Slam Final (Men’s Single) to be played on Sunday

       Players                    Court                     Time

       N. Djokovic (Serbian Champion)

     Vs                   Centre Court        6:30 PM

      N. Kyrgios   (Australian Champion)      

Some Facts about Both Player For Final (Men’s Single)

 Novak Djokovic                            Nick Kyrgios     

WTA Rank: 3                                     40

6770 points                                       1070 points  

Wimbledon Champion 6th times    0

Will fight for 32nd Trophy                1st Grand Slam

Read more: ‘100 days to go’: Countdown starts for T20I World Cup 2022
